trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli wishes you to lend a hand with Wawkesa's eatery.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_TODO_00<tab>Use the game bird whistle at the designated location and obtain a fledgling of Ligaka thigh.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fledgling of Ligaka thigh to Wawkesa.

TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_001<tab>Wawkesa has requested the meat of a certain monstrous bird that dwells in the upper reaches of Kozama'uka─an ingredient he's apparently familiar with from the time he lived in the area.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_002<tab>I fully endorse his wish to introduce more variety to the eatery, so I thought to send our most experienced warrior to procure it. What say you?
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_003<tab>Wawkesa has made another procurement request! His Ligaka thigh special was most well received, and he needs to restock his meat supply.

TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_004<tab>Blowing on this game bird whistle near the falls of Miyakabek'zoma should bring a fledgling of Ligaka right to your location. Once you have the meat we need, please make the delivery to Wawkesa.

TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_005<tab>I made a request to Yubli for fresh ingredients, but I didn't expect they would send <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. Well, I, uh...appreciate the help. Truly.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_020<tab>Oh, you've brought the meat I tasked Yubli with procuring?
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_021<tab>Now that's a nice hunk of bird! The dishes we used to make from this back in our old, uh, “hunting grounds” were always camp favorites.

TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_022<tab>The Hanu prefer leafy greens and bugs over beast flesh, so there's not much around in the way of meaty cuisine. A few customers mentioned they'd like something to sink their teeth into, though, and that got me to thinking about a new menu.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_023<tab>The meat is tasty enough just grilled over charcoal... Or maybe I can try that fried bird recipe Chekochuk taught me about!
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_024<tab>People seem to love the recipe Chekochuk taught me for frying the thigh and coating it in “tangyspices.” I can see it becoming a local specialty.

TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_WAWKESA_000_025<tab>The distinctive flavor─packed with savory tenderness─is something only the fledgling of Ligaka can provide. You have my thanks, as does Yubli. You've done me a great favor here!
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_029<tab>Any troubles procuring the meat? If all is well, I can take the whistle off your hands for now.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_030<tab>I'm glad to hear Wawkesa was pleased! Such ingredients are difficult to come by without someone trained in battle─which makes us very lucky to have you around.
TEXT_BANPEL122_05220_YUBLI_000_031<tab>Wawkesa's cuisine is greatly enjoyed by our visitors, so I hope you'll be willing to help out again soon!
